policies.involuntary_refund:
• Eligible when flight is canceled/delayed >15 min, diverted, changed, or government restriction applies.
• Full refund including base fare and YQ/YR.
• If first segment qualifies, downstream segments may be included.
• Refund request must be made within ticket validity (1 year).
• Refunds for diverted flights granted in full if routing not completed.

Processing:
• Refunds processed only to original payment method.
• Credit card: original card only. Currency differences may result in variation.
• Government taxes refundable unless nonrefundable by law.
policies.involuntary_reissue:
• Applies for: delay >15 min, cancellation, misconnection under MCT, aircraft change, emergencies.
• One free change allowed ±3 days from original date.
• If no Juneyao flight available: other carrier allowed with consent.
• Rerouting valid only within terms of original contract.
• If rebooked to another airline, passenger may return to Juneyao for free within 3 days.
policies.voluntary_refund:
Voluntary Refunds:
• Unused tickets: full refund minus applicable refund fee.
• Partially used: refund equals remaining refundable fare minus recalculated portion and fee.
• Refund = base fare + YQ/YR – used value – refund fee – nonrefundable amounts.
• YQ/YR refunds follow base fare rules.
• Infant tickets (no seat): no fee. Children: same rules as adults.
• Refunds allowed only if all unused segments are refunded together.
policies.medical_refund:
• Medical waivers require certified diagnosis from eligible institutions.
• Death of passenger: full refund with certificate. Companion: refund with same-day request and documentation.
• No refund for missed flights due to personal reasons unless illness/death applies.
• Overbooking: free rebook, refund, or alternate transport arranged.
• Delay >4h: financial and service compensation may apply.
• Force majeure: refund of unused segment only. No other compensation required.
• Downgrade compensation: refund difference + flat amount (max 800 RMB).
policies.name_change:
Free Corrections:
• Chinese pronunciation differences, simplified/traditional character variation
• Title corrections (MR/MS/CHD)
• Pinyin format discrepancies, name inversion
• Legal changes with proof

Charged Corrections:
• One Chinese character or ≤6 English letters → CNY 100 fee
• Applies only to HO-operated and HO-issued tickets
• Contact: +86 21 95520 for approval

Conditions:
• One-time correction only; agents must not modify without approval
• Name change ≠ passenger substitution
• English correction applies only to foreigners/minorities
policies.group_booking:
• Group pricing offered for 10+ passengers
• Add-on refunds (seat, baggage) calculated by cabin class (J/Y)
• Infants charged standard fee; children same as adults
• Free correction for minor name issues, but fee applies for significant edits
• Agents must use official channel to secure fare quote and submit name list
• Name changes before ticketing: free
• After ticketing: fee applies per passenger
policies.infant_policy:
• Infants: ≥14 days and <2 years old
• One infant per adult allowed
• Fare: 10% of adult fare (no seat)
• Extra infant requires child ticket with seat
• Infant may use FAA-approved seat with extra ticket
• No financial compensation for infant fares during delays
• Free baggage: 10kg checked + stroller/cradle/car seat (1 item)
policies.baggage_policy:
• Carry-on: 1 piece, max 10kg, 20x40x55cm
• Checked: max 50kg per item (domestic)
• Infant: 10kg checked + 1 stroller/cradle free
• No valuables (e.g. cash, jewelry, documents) in checked baggage
• Musical instruments and service dogs: subject to preapproval
• Seat-occupying baggage allowed with special reservation (max 75kg)
• Declared value limit: CNY 8,000 per passenger. Surcharge: 5‰ on excess
policies.seat_request_policy:
• Seat assignments not guaranteed; subject to operational changes
• Preferred seats can be purchased separately
• Emergency exit seats restricted to physically fit adults
• Infant must not occupy emergency exit seat row
• Oversized carry-on or unpaid seat item may be denied at gate
policies.short_term_cancellation_policy:
• Free cancellation if:
  → Ticket booked via JuneyaoAir.com or mobile app
  → Cancellation within 24 hours of purchase
  → Flight departs at least 7 days from time of booking (≥168 hours)
• Refunds:
  → Credit card: processed in 7 business days
  → Cash/check: processed in 20 business days
• Add-on services (baggage, seat selection) are not refundable
• Outside this window, refunds follow voluntary policy rules

support_contacts._note: For internal use only. Do not include in autoresponse emails.
